sentences.en: A contract signed now might be invalidated at some future date.
sentences.cn: 现在签订的合同可能在将来的某一天就会失效。

sentences.en: A formal contract is signed which is renewable annually.
sentences.cn: 正式签订了每年可续签的合同。

sentences.en: Barnes was resolved to moving on when his contract expired.
sentences.cn: 合同到期以后，巴恩斯决定做点别的。

sentences.en: Employees who refuse to relocate are in breach of contract (= have done something not allowed by their contracts ) .
sentences.cn: 员工拒绝调动岗位是违反合约的。

sentences.en: Getting out of the contract would be no problem.
sentences.cn: 撤销这个合同不会有任何问题。

sentences.en: He says this contract should not be patterned after the Deere pact.
sentences.cn: 他说这个合同不应该模仿《迪尔协定》。

sentences.en: hey are contracted to work 35 hours a week.
sentences.cn: 他们签下合同每周工作35小时。

sentences.en: Malcolm's contract will run in tandem with his existing one.
sentences.cn: 马尔科姆的合同将与他手头的合同同时生效。

sentences.en: She's coining it in with a $10 million contract with Revlon.
sentences.cn: 她靠与露华浓签订的一笔1,000万美元的合同发了大财。

sentences.en: Shell signed a contract to develop oil and gas reserves near Archangel.
sentences.cn: 壳牌石油公司签订了一份开采阿尔汉格尔附近的石油和天然气资源的合同。

sentences.en: The 30-year-old star is trying to free himself from his recording contract.
sentences.cn: 这位30岁的明星正试图从他的唱片合约中脱身。

sentences.en: The company won a prestigious contract for work on Europe's tallest building.
sentences.cn: 这家公司赢得了一份极为重要的合同，参与建设欧洲最高的大厦。

sentences.en: The contract for this will no doubt be widely advertised.
sentences.cn: 关于这个的合约无疑会受到广泛宣传。

sentences.en: The contract was to run from 1992 to 2020.
sentences.cn: 这份合同在1992年至2020年间有效。

sentences.en: The director wanted Olivia de Havilland, then under contract to Warner Brothers.
sentences.cn: 导演想要当时签约于华纳兄弟娱乐公司旗下的奥利维娅·德哈维兰出演。

sentences.en: The economy has contracted by 2.5% since last year.
sentences.cn: 自去年起经济已经萎缩了2.5%。

sentences.en: The TV rights contract came up for renegotiation in 1988.
sentences.cn: 1988年，电视转播权合同该重新谈判了。

sentences.en: They can transfer or share the contract with whosoever they choose.
sentences.cn: 他们可以与他们选择的任何人交换或分享这份合约。

words.tran_cn: 合约地；合同性地；契约规定地

phrases.tran_cn: 签订合同；签合同；签署合同
社会契约（统治者与被统治者订定的详列权利义务的契约，等于social 社会契约论；compact）；民约论

trans.tran_en: an official agreement between two or more people, stating what each will do

trans.tran_cn: 感染， 染上； 订； 使皱缩； 使缩小
